long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Post interesting content to ConnectBy with a convenient right-click from almost anywhere on the internet.   This includes images, links to web pages or text "quotes".  
Enhances your ability to share with the world what you find interesting.  Allows you and other ConnectBy members to more conveniently get to know the global community.  All anonymously.
Follow the activity of interesting people and let others follow you.  
Send "friend requests" to people with whom you want to have the ability to privately chat.
ConnectBy is the service for the people of the world to "Connect at a rapid pace, in a friendly manner"!
